title: 53: Stand Tall, Women
dc:creator: Canon Press
description:
• Did you miss us? This episode is just a bit tardy to make sure you all cared! (emotional manipulation intensifies)
  • This episode responds to a reader question, basically: if your daughters imitate Diana Boone, won't they be a bit...well... masculine, what with hunting rifle and leather jacket and all?
  • The discussion takes the guys afield as they discuss heroines in the Bible, literature, and society...
  • They also discuss the literary deceptions that are specially intended to lead female protagonists (and female readers) astray.
  • Sorry, Thanksgiving is not mentioned, not even once. Make your own applications as appropriate, and enjoy your gratitude!

Check out The Sinking City: https://canonpress.com/products/the-sinking-city/
